title: Euro 2020, Next Generation and the lure of Guildford – Football Weekly Extra
text:
Max Rushden , Barry Glendenning , Philippe Auclair and Marcus Christenson discuss the security of Harry Kane’s starting berth, Wales’s testing time, mass departures in the Football League and Phil Neville making unforced errors in press conferences … again

Join the conversation on Facebook, Twitter and email.

We start by looking forward to the latest round of international fixtures and assessing the home nations’ chances before tests on and off the pitch.

Several sides lose their managers – find out which of them Barry is in the running to take over – and we speak to Suzy Wrack about Phil Neville’s latest outburst.

Back on Monday.

PS: we have just announced a show at the Science Museum, entitled Football Weekly versus Science. Join Max, Barry, Barney Ronay and Nicky Bandini by clicking here.

PPS: also freshly announced, our Christmas special – this time taking place at Indigo at the O2. Max, Barry, Jonathan Wilson, Elis James. More info and tickets here.

PPPS: we are also returning to Leeds in December – Max, Lars Sivertsen, Jonathan Wilson plus one more TBA, click here.

PPPPS: if you’re on the other side of the Irish Sea, come and see us in Dublin! Max and Barry plus two more TBA, more details to be found here.
description: Max Rushden, Barry Glendenning, Philippe Auclair and Marcus Christenson discuss the security of Harry Kane’s starting berth, Wales’s testing time, mass departures in the Football League and Phil Neville making unforced errors in press conferences… again
